TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_pwn_Xiulin, title = Xiulin, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Paiwan]}, url = {https://pwn.wikipedia.org/wiki/Xiulin} }

S.FORM: siuling guan (tinurukuan: Bsuring), i maza i pasaviri tua taiwan a kalinku king, a i viri nakicaing ta heping a pana dideq kata nan-aw gu, a i tjaikacedas a viri na kicevung tua taipingyan, a i kacedas a keledep kicaing tua sincen, hualien hici, djian, suvung, au a pasamaza ledepan kicencen ta i heping kata ren-ay guan, a i navalj nakicaing tua i wanrung guan. a tjaljaqacan a guan i taiwan, au tjaljatjuruvuan ta caucau ta i kacalisian a guan. izua tu 1,642 km² a pulingetjan nua kadjunangan na siuling gu. a kadjunangan namalap tu qevas 35% i kalinku king, a kinaqacan sika masantjelulj a kinakudralan tua i taiwan a paljavak. izua a ita kudraw sa unem kuzulj a caucau, ka 2020 a caviljan sika sepatj a qiljas vinutanga nantu sin-yi guan, masan tjaljatjuruvuan a kacalisian i qinaljan. sedjelj a turuku zuku. a kadjunangan i siuling guan avan za gadugaduan kata calisi izua 99%, kimaya a na li-wu a pana kata heping a pana a tjinevelj a vudavudasan lizuk. saka aza caucau tjatjuruvu a namatevelj imaza. au avan ca kinalangan nua kadjunangan pakata tairugu nua kuka kakivangvangan kata masansivalj a djalanan i taiwan (zunghen kunglu) saka masan tjalja pungadan. kadjunangan i pasakacedasan a siuling gu imaza gadugaduan i vecekadan tua taiwan, avan nusekuya sana kauvu a kinakadjunangan. saka a kalevelevan kilaing tua vavavan na gadu sa maretimalji a kalevelevan. aza qinaljan tjaliav a nasepaljavak tua turuku a kakiunangan. aicu a i maza a sikataqaljan sedjelj a seturuku a caucau, namirazek aravac tataliduan. izua a pana a pasamaza, izua heping a pana, li'u a pana, cinsuy a pana, muga a pana. kata tjaljavavavan a gadu imaza, izua nanhu a gadu , zungyangtjian a gadu , cilay a gadu ,wumin a gadu , akana hehuan gadu i pasakacedasan . cinalivatan ka cinting a djiday, siuling sipavecik ta taitu zilizu a kicapilj. ka ripun a djiday, pinaka "nakacalisian a kadjunangan", au sipavecik ta yenhay citing kata kalinkukangting a rukicapiljan ta nakacalisian a sengsengan. au kapuamin a maqaqeci, nasinipavecik a pisincen gu. ka 1946 a caviljan. aza sihu venarung tu paljiavavav ta qiniladjan kata pusaladj a pakata nemanga i kacalisian kadjunangan, i tua ta maqepu a kacalisian qinaljan kata mamazangiljan pukakudan, au pavalitan ta "gu", saka a semusu tua niamadju a rarasudjan, ulja ljiavavav a qiniladjan a sinkiw. linindjelj ta "wusilin" avan angata aicu siuling maitucu. izua pitjaisangas a ngadan, avan "selin gu" , lja mamaw kata "selin" i taipaq, saka pakata kadjunangan a kinanguaqan. izua liaw a gaugauan kata kasiw, saka avananga ta sinipungadan "siuling guan". tucu sinivarung ta pavalitan ta "tairuku" aicu ngadan a qinaljan, ulja masansimatjelj aza kacalisian a qinaljan pitjaivililj ta alisan, timur kata namasia pasucikel tua kangadanan. guciu nasidjaravacan paljavak tua kadjunangan caucau sinupuan kinsic izua liaw a gadugaduan kata djiniqes nua zaljum a kinalangan nua kadjunangan i siuling gu, saka a imaza a riuku namirazek aravac. pakata ziriu nua kingsihu, izua 30 mata 40 a kudraw a caucau ljemitaqiljas semamaza i tairugu nua kuni a kakivangvangan kata nakuni a kadjunangan i masansivalulj a djalanan i taiwan (zunghen kunglu), pinakacuan tu liaw ta kinsic a manguaqan mamaw saka tja tauta liaw sikamanguaqan tu pupicul. lja tjaliaw a djiljeqi a valji, simindu inalang a sengsengan kata heping kuba avan nu sinan pazangal. au pakata kakivecengel kemasiziriu a kinisan nua kingsihu, aza talem a racev i siuling gu, izua vurasi kata siak. mata 2014 a cavilj, izua tu 30.73 marutarauljan a kadjunangan temalem ta siak. zua qinuma 7.3% a talem i kalingu king. izuanan 24.92 marutarauljan a kadjunangan temalem ta vurasi, kimaya qemavas 13% a kinilamian pakata penuljat a sengsengan i kalingu king. au izua talem a puday, ljakua kedri a kiniaya. kivangvangan tairugu nua kuni kakivangvangan baiyang taljitiu cancun pakung licin taljitiu buluwan a kivanvangan cinsuy danggay dayuling guanyuan kinakalevelevan kadjunangan tiansiang pukasikasivan a kivanvangan hehuan gadu wensan a ungesing sanyue tjakudrangcilay gadu lungdjian hisiu waday paljaljavak lansan kasikasiw a kisiya a djalan halun kasikasiw kisiya a djalan aicu ziriu pakata caucau semamaza i tairugu nua kuka kinakalevelevan kadjunangan.

sioling goan (tinorokoan: Bsoring), i maza i pasaviri toa taiwan a kalinko king, a i viri nakicaing ta heping a pana dideq kata nan-aw go, a i tjaikacedas a viri na kicevong toa taipingyan, a i kacedas a keledep kicaing toa sincen, hoalien hici, djian, sovong, ao a pasamaza ledepan kicencen ta i heping kata ren-ay goan, a i navalj nakicaing toa i wanrong goan. a tjaljaqacan a goan i taiwan, ao tjaljatjorovoan ta caocao ta i kacalisian a goan. izoa to 1,642 km² a polingetjan noa kadjonangan na sioling go. a kadjonangan namalap to qevas 35% i kalinko king, a kinaqacan sika masantjelolj a kinakodralan toa i taiwan a paljavak. izoa a ita kodraw sa onem kozolj a caocao, ka 2020 a caviljan sika sepatj a qiljas vinotanga nanto sin-yi goan, masan tjaljatjorovoan a kacalisian i qinaljan. sedjelj a toroko zoko. a kadjonangan i sioling goan avan za gadogadoan kata calisi izoa 99%, kimaya a na li-wo a pana kata heping a pana a tjinevelj a vodavodasan lizok. saka aza caocao tjatjorovo a namatevelj imaza. ao avan ca kinalangan noa kadjonangan pakata tairogo noa koka kakivangvangan kata masansivalj a djalanan i taiwan (zonghen konglo) saka masan tjalja pongadan. kadjonangan i pasakacedasan a sioling go imaza gadogadoan i vecekadan toa taiwan, avan nosekoya sana kaovo a kinakadjonangan. saka a kalevelevan kilaing toa vavavan na gado sa maretimalji a kalevelevan. aza qinaljan tjaliav a nasepaljavak toa toroko a kakionangan. aico a i maza a sikataqaljan sedjelj a setoroko a caocao, namirazek aravac tatalidoan. izoa a pana a pasamaza, izoa heping a pana, li'o a pana, cinsoy a pana, moga a pana. kata tjaljavavavan a gado imaza, izoa nanho a gado , zongyangtjian a gado , cilay a gado ,womin a gado , akana hehoan gado i pasakacedasan . cinalivatan ka cinting a djiday, sioling sipavecik ta taito zilizo a kicapilj. ka ripon a djiday, pinaka "nakacalisian a kadjonangan", ao sipavecik ta yenhay citing kata kalinkokangting a rokicapiljan ta nakacalisian a sengsengan. ao kapoamin a maqaqeci, nasinipavecik a pisincen go. ka 1946 a caviljan. aza siho venarong to paljiavavav ta qiniladjan kata posaladj a pakata nemanga i kacalisian kadjonangan, i toa ta maqepo a kacalisian qinaljan kata mamazangiljan pokakodan, ao pavalitan ta "go", saka a semoso toa niamadjo a rarasodjan, olja ljiavavav a qiniladjan a sinkiw. linindjelj ta "wosilin" avan angata aico sioling maitoco. izoa pitjaisangas a ngadan, avan "selin go" , lja mamaw kata "selin" i taipaq, saka pakata kadjonangan a kinangoaqan. izoa liaw a gaogaoan kata kasiw, saka avananga ta sinipongadan "sioling goan". toco sinivarong ta pavalitan ta "tairoko" aico ngadan a qinaljan, olja masansimatjelj aza kacalisian a qinaljan pitjaivililj ta alisan, timor kata namasia pasocikel toa kangadanan. gocio nasidjaravacan paljavak toa kadjonangan caocao sinopoan kinsic izoa liaw a gadogadoan kata djiniqes noa zaljom a kinalangan noa kadjonangan i sioling go, saka a imaza a rioko namirazek aravac. pakata zirio noa kingsiho, izoa 30 mata 40 a kodraw a caocao ljemitaqiljas semamaza i tairogo noa koni a kakivangvangan kata nakoni a kadjonangan i masansivalolj a djalanan i taiwan (zonghen konglo), pinakacoan to liaw ta kinsic a mangoaqan mamaw saka tja taota liaw sikamangoaqan to popicol. lja tjaliaw a djiljeqi a valji, simindo inalang a sengsengan kata heping koba avan no sinan pazangal. ao pakata kakivecengel kemasizirio a kinisan noa kingsiho, aza talem a racev i sioling go, izoa vorasi kata siak. mata 2014 a cavilj, izoa to 30.73 marotaraoljan a kadjonangan temalem ta siak. zoa qinoma 7.3% a talem i kalingo king. izoanan 24.92 marotaraoljan a kadjonangan temalem ta vorasi, kimaya qemavas 13% a kinilamian pakata penoljat a sengsengan i kalingo king. ao izoa talem a poday, ljakoa kedri a kiniaya. kivangvangan tairogo noa koni kakivangvangan baiyang taljitio cancon pakong licin taljitio bolowan a kivanvangan cinsoy danggay dayoling goanyoan kinakalevelevan kadjonangan tiansiang pokasikasivan a kivanvangan hehoan gado wensan a ongesing sanyoe tjakodrangcilay gado longdjian hisio waday paljaljavak lansan kasikasiw a kisiya a djalan halon kasikasiw kisiya a djalan aico zirio pakata caocao semamaza i tairogo noa koka kinakalevelevan kadjonangan.
